listitem.para: Whether or not to allow to be redirected when received IKEv2 REDIRECT notify payloads (RFC 5685) in IKE_AUTH reply (so called connection based redirects). Typical use case for this is clients-server use case, where the client is the one receiving the payload and initiating new IKEv2 exchange with the new gateway. Accepted values are no (the default) meaning never process any received REDIRECT notify payload and yes meaning always process and initiate a new connection.
